meta.title: Armis | Case Study
meta.description: Armis Increases Agility And Performance Of It’s Sales Team with Aviso’s AI Forecasting and Deal Signals

content.subtitle: CASE STUDY
content.title: Armis Replaces Gong and Clari With Aviso to Increase Agility & Performance

content.subtitle: TECHNOLOGY
content.description: Founded in 2015 and HQed in Palo Alto, CA, Armis helps businesses discover and secure managed, unmanaged, and IoT devices, including medical devices and industrial control systems (ICS)

items.title: Trevor and the team are pioneering the vision of what true unified sales and revenue operations platform. Aviso AI is the only platform that can truly say they are AI-based GTM compass
items.description: Jason Mead, VP, Global Revenue Operations, Armis

content.title: Armis replaced Gong and Clari with Aviso for better accuracy with deal guidance and  forecasting towards a unified revenue operations platform

items.title: Challenges Faced
items.description:
• Inaccurate forecasting because of Clari system (by almost margin of 90% at times)
  • Lack of forecasting guidance or historical time-series data to support insights
  • Complex forecasting using spreadsheets
  • Clari implemented system showed lagging indicators versus leading indicators
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 20H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h10a2 2 0 012 2v1m2 13a2 2 0 01-2-2V7m2 13a2 2 0 002-2V9a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2m-4-3H9M7 16h6M7 8h6v4H7V8z" /></svg>

items.title: Solution Provided
items.description:
• Aviso Insights with Deal rooms, configured Forecasting processes, and Custom Labels
  • Predictive forecasting (with 95% accuracy) based on data science-driven predictive modeling
  • Deal and Pipeline insights
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 21a4 4 0 01-4-4V5a2 2 0 012-2h4a2 2 0 012 2v12a4 4 0 01-4 4zm0 0h12a2 2 0 002-2v-4a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2.343M11 7.343l1.657-1.657a2 2 0 012.828 0l2.829 2.829a2 2 0 010 2.828l-8.486 8.485M7 17h.01" /></svg>

content.title: Benefits for Armis
content.description: Armis replaced Gong and Clari with Aviso for better accuracy with deal guidance and  forecasting towards a unified revenue operations platform

items.title: “Single pane of glass” for real time insights across a hypergrowth startup business
Agility in the go-to-market process with analysis of incoming signals
Consolidated tools and forecasting process across teams, segments, and products
Seamless bi-directional integration with Salesforce CRM
Increased accuracy for predictions and financial planning
